1.1.name: wordpress/tp-gallery-slider
1.1.description:
This simple plugin shows a large size image in the page and below a scrollable row of thumbnails without scrollbar. You can scroll the thumbs while mouseover or mouseclick and choose an image for the big view. you can also add each image a short description that displaying on the big image (the description is the images alt). you can display slider from another post/page by passing his ID to the short code [tp_gallery post_id="id"]. also there is a setting page with beautiful preview box.

  • New!!! from T&P plugins: T&P Navigation Menu - Sticky navigation menu.
